venue.name: Buttonwood Tree Performing Arts and Cultural Center

item.description:
Hello Creative Arts and Culture Friends,

I know it has been a very long time since I have planned a meetup, but this opportunity to host a memorable evening of beautiful music and poetry while supporting Gale B. Gardiner and her calling to help orphans in three location thoughout the world really got me out of the woodwork. 

Some of you may have seen Gale perform at other events at fundraisers, such as the fundraisers for Haiti we hosted a couple of years ago.   She has a magical voice and a very warm heart.  This year sees the release of her 11th CD entitled very appropriately Welcome Home.  As she explains at http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/galebgardiner3 : Proceeds of all CD sales/concerts to summer music camps for orphans -Cheyenne River Reservation (SD), St. Vincent's Port au Prince Haiti, and Mostar (Bosnia/Croatia).  Gale is reaching out to those without homes through music.  She is also planning a trip to St. Vincent's this summer to help participate first hand.

The CD is unique in that is has a blend of music and spoken word and many instrumental pieces.  I think seeing these performers live will be a great experience.  And many of you are already great fans of the Buttonwood Tree  http://www.buttonwood.org/.  There are lots of great restaurants in downtown Middletown for before the show, and the setting is cozy and lovely, right on Main Street. 

There is a $10.00 donation requested.

Hope to see you there!

Kelly
item.name: Fortune's Gale and Guests CD Release & Benefit at the Buttonwood Tree!
